A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Way to go. They destroy everything that was beloved about the most successful film franchise ever. They even flushed everything that was good about the JJ film down the toilet. Apparently none of it mattered!  Im so sick of politics in real life and now we have to have it shoved down our f-ing throats by politically rabid producers\, writers and directors.  I hate them for what they have done. I hate the gender quotas\, race quotas and the neutering of ALL the masculinity of these characters.  Hollywood deserves everything that is happening to it.
